description.action: Evan, the oldest child, looks up at the Koopa Troopers with a frightened expression, his hands bound in chains.
Isaac, the younger brother, sits next to Evan, his eyes wide with fear as he stares at the Koopa Troopers.
Aaron, the energetic middle child, tries to hide his fear, but his trembling hands betray his anxiety.
Aurelia, the youngest, clings to Evan, tears streaming down her face as she whimpers in terror.
Koopa1, a Koopa Trooper, stands over the children, his spear gripped tightly as he glares down at them menacingly.
Koopa2, another Koopa Trooper, stands next to Koopa1, his one-eyed gaze fixed on the terrified children.
